name: part_002
file: tmp_【3DLIVE】重大告知あり！ #天音かなた生誕祭 「堕天使の憂鬱」⧸ Amane Kanata 3DLIVE ＂Melancholy of the Fallen Angel＂【ホロライブ】 [UdbB5g1ncHs]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

scenes.description: Amane Kanata performs the song "Hana no Ato de".
MC segment where Amane Kanata introduces herself and discusses the "Angel and Fallen Angel" theme of her birthday live.
Amane Kanata performs a cover of "Yoidore Shirazu" in a dark, rainy atmosphere.
A brief monologue interlude leading into the next song.
Amane Kanata performs an energetic cover of "Nani Yatte mo Umaku Ikanai".

subtitles.original: 君の毒は私の薬って
subtitles.english: Your poison is my medicine,

subtitles.original: 包んであげるから 楽にして
subtitles.english: I'll wrap you up, so just relax.

subtitles.original: 君の闇は私の光って
subtitles.english: Your darkness is my light,

subtitles.original: 愛してあげるから 笑って
subtitles.english: I'll love you, so please smile.

subtitles.original: はい！皆そ～こんかなた～！
subtitles.english: Hi! Hello everyone!

subtitles.original: 握力50キロ、ギュッギュッにぎりつぶしちゃうぞ、
subtitles.english: With 50kg grip strength, I'll crush you tight,

subtitles.original: ホロライブ4期生 かなたんこと天音かなたです！
subtitles.english: Hololive 4th gen, Kanatan, also known as Amane Kanata!

subtitles.original: ということでね、えー、2曲お聴きいただきましたがね、
subtitles.english: And with that, you've just heard two songs,

subtitles.original: 今回も生誕ライブ始まってまいりました！
subtitles.english: this birthday live has finally begun!

subtitles.original: 皆さんぜひね、ハッシュタグを
subtitles.english: Everyone, please use the hashtag

subtitles.original: 使っていっぱいね、呟いてください、ポストしてください！
subtitles.english: and tweet a lot, please post!

subtitles.original: ハッシュタグはね、#天音かなた生誕ライブ でございます。
subtitles.english: The hashtag is #天音かなた生誕ライブ.

subtitles.original: すごいシンプルでしょ？
subtitles.english: It's very simple, right?

subtitles.original: ぜひね、あの、色々呟いてもらえたら嬉しいなと思います！
subtitles.english: I'd be happy if you could tweet all sorts of things!

subtitles.original: そしてこのステージ見てください！
subtitles.english: And look at this stage!

subtitles.original: これすごいでしょ、めちゃめちゃ綺麗でしょ。
subtitles.english: This is great, isn't it? It's so beautiful.

subtitles.original: いや、なぜかと言いますとですね、今回の生誕も実はちょっとストーリーがありまして、
subtitles.english: Well, the reason is, this birthday actually has a bit of a story,

subtitles.original: 皆さん何度も見てね、考えてほしいなと思うんですが、
subtitles.english: and I want everyone to watch it many times and think about it,

subtitles.original: 天使と堕天使が、
subtitles.english: an angel and a fallen angel,

subtitles.original: まぁちょっとね、堕天使の方が世界を滅ぼしたいらしいと。
subtitles.english: well, it seems the fallen angel wants to destroy the world.

subtitles.original: で、天使が立ちはだかって言ってみたいな、
subtitles.english: And the angel stands in her way,

subtitles.original: 天使が守るみたいな、世界を守るぜ、
subtitles.english: saying the angel will protect the world,

subtitles.original: いや、やるぜ、みたいなテーマ、戦いな感じになっておりますので、
subtitles.english: no, I'll do it, that's the theme, it's like a battle,

subtitles.original: ぜひその辺りも意識して歌でバトル見てくれたら嬉しいなと思います！
subtitles.english: so I hope you'll keep that in mind and enjoy the song battle!

subtitles.original: うわぁ、言い残したことはないかな？
subtitles.english: Wow, is there anything else I forgot to say?

subtitles.original: またね、あの、歌っていきますので、よろしくお願いします！
subtitles.english: I'll be singing more, so please stay with me!

subtitles.original: お、なんか...
subtitles.english: Oh, something...

subtitles.original: 空が泣きそうじゃない？
subtitles.english: Doesn't it look like the sky is about to cry?

subtitles.original: それでは皆さん、引き続きライブをお楽しみください。
subtitles.english: Ah, well then everyone, please continue to enjoy the live.

subtitles.original: 夢が冷めた 酔いどれ知らず
subtitles.english: Awakened from a dream, unaware of being drunk,

subtitles.original: 争いごとは 夜が明けるまで
subtitles.english: Quarrels until the break of dawn.

subtitles.original: くたびれては 酷く見える
subtitles.english: Getting tired, it looks terrible.

subtitles.original: 一千の声は 声が枯れるまで
subtitles.english: A thousand voices, until voices run dry.

subtitles.original: うっちゃり幸せ ずっと冷めないで
subtitles.english: Thrown-away happiness, please don't ever cool down.

subtitles.original: あなたの声に 耳を貸す時まで
subtitles.english: Until the time I lend an ear to your voice.

subtitles.original: 屈する態度で 言葉さえなくて
subtitles.english: With a submissive attitude, without even words,

subtitles.original: 体も染めて
subtitles.english: Staining even my body.

subtitles.original: そして 泥々 溢れ出る ほら
subtitles.english: And then, muddy and overflowing, look,

subtitles.original: 最悪だわ
subtitles.english: It's the worst.

subtitles.original: 腐る先まで 見るグラマー
subtitles.english: Seeing glamour until it rots.

subtitles.original: 酩々 重ね重ね 存外
subtitles.english: Drunkenly, over and over, unexpectedly.

subtitles.original: さぁ 悪くないわ
subtitles.english: Well, it's not bad.

subtitles.original: 酔いどれ知らずの 恋敵だから
subtitles.english: Since it's a drunk-unaware love rival.

subtitles.original: 歌の声は 数知れず
subtitles.english: Singing voices are countless,

subtitles.original: 迷い込んだら そこは君の庭
subtitles.english: If you wander in, that's your garden.

subtitles.original: 練り歩いてる 白昼のランド
subtitles.english: Parading through a midday land.

subtitles.original: 威勢を隠して 泥を吐けるだけ
subtitles.english: Hiding high spirits, only able to spit mud.

subtitles.original: 如何の幸せ きっと離さないで
subtitles.english: What kind of happiness, please don't let go.

subtitles.original: あなたのそばに 耳を貸す時まで
subtitles.english: By your side, until the time I lend an ear.

subtitles.original: 屈する態度で 言葉さえなくて
subtitles.english: With a submissive attitude, without even words,

subtitles.original: 心を染めて
subtitles.english: Staining my heart.

subtitles.original: それは 泥々 溢れ出る ほら
subtitles.english: That is, muddy and overflowing, look,

subtitles.original: 最悪だわ
subtitles.english: It's the worst.

subtitles.original: 腐る私は 生きたいの
subtitles.english: Rotting, I want to live.

subtitles.original: 酩々 重ね重ね 存外
subtitles.english: Drunkenly, over and over, unexpectedly.

subtitles.original: さぁ 悪くないわ
subtitles.english: Well, it's not bad.

subtitles.original: 酔いどれ知らずの 物物語を
subtitles.english: A drunk-unaware story.

subtitles.original: 高くそびえ、汚い言葉で誰かを傷つけた...
subtitles.english: Towering high, you hurt someone with filthy words...

subtitles.original: なにやってもうまくいかない
subtitles.english: Nothing I do goes well,

subtitles.original: 脳内戦争だもんで ずっと立って立って
subtitles.english: It's an inner war, so I'm just standing and standing.

subtitles.original: なにやってもうまくいかない
subtitles.english: Nothing I do goes well,

subtitles.original: 愛して 愛して
subtitles.english: Love me, love me.

subtitles.original: なにやってもうまくいかない
subtitles.english: Nothing I do goes well,

subtitles.original: なにやってもうまくいかない
subtitles.english: nothing I do goes well.

subtitles.original: ハッホラ 見てすごいでしょうが
subtitles.english: Ha, look, it's amazing, isn't it?

subtitles.original: おったまげなナイスバディが 飛び交うフィールド
subtitles.english: A surprising nice body flying around the field.
